alert.note: Alert for Warren (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 24 at 3:15PM EST until December 25 at 6:00AM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain expected. Total ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Warren. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 6 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Very slippery sidewalks, roads and bridges are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The main areas affected will be locations along and north of the Interstate 80 corridor within the advisory area.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible isolated power outages. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
